Script.name: Table File Storage
Script.script:
if (not MM_Util) then MM_Util = {} end function MM_Util:loadTable(module, t) --- test if we can open the file local f = io.open(getMudletHomeDir() .. "\\" .. module .. ".mudlet") if f == nil then self.saveTable(module, t) else io.close(f) end --- Force a save to create the file table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "\\" .. module .. ".mudlet", t) end
function MM_Util:saveTable(module, t) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "\\" .. module .. ".mudlet", t) end

Script.name: Combination Rolls
Script.script: function MM_Util:getNextCombo(tbl, num) local powers = {} local c = 1 for i, v in pairs(tbl) do powers[i] = c c = v * c end local combo = {} for i = #powers, 1, -1 do combo[i] = math.floor(num / powers[i]) num = num % powers[i] end display(combo) end
